text: This Privacy Policy explains what information Virtual Sapiens, Inc., a Delaware C Corp ("Virtual Sapiens, Inc.", "us", "we", or "our") collects about you and why, what we may do with that information and how we handle your information and content, including Personal Data (as defined below).

This Privacy Policy explains what information Virtual Sapiens, Inc., a Delaware C Corp ("Virtual Sapiens, Inc.", "us", "we", or "our") collects about you and why, what we may do with that information and how we handle your information and content, including Personal Data (as defined below).

As with most websites and technology services delivered over the internet, we may automatically collect data when you access or use our Site and/or Services and record it in log files.
This log data may include the IP address, browser type, the date and time of use, information about browser configuration, language preferences, cookie data, and information about your computer or mobile device, such as the type of hardware and software you are using.

As with most websites and technology services delivered over the internet, we may automatically collect data when you access or use our Site and/or Services and record it in log files.
This log data may include the IP address, browser type, the date and time of use, information about browser configuration, language preferences, cookie data, and information about your computer or mobile device, such as the type of hardware and software you are using.
Gathering this kind of information helps us administer our Services and provide convenient and direct communications.
Our partners use cookies to ensure that the site works properly, to detect and prevent fraud and understand how people interact with their services.

This Privacy Policy explains what information Virtual Sapiens, Inc., a Delaware C Corp ("Virtual Sapiens, Inc.", "us", "we", or "our") collects about you and why, what we may do with that information and how we handle your information and content, including Personal Data (as defined below).

How do we use your information?

We may use the information we collect from you when you activate Virtual Sapiens, answer a survey, sign up for marketing communications or otherwise interact with the Site, in the following ways:

As with most websites and technology services delivered over the internet, we may automatically collect data when you access or use our Site and/or Services and record it in log files.
This log data may include the IP address, browser type, the date and time of use, information about browser configuration, language preferences, cookie data, and information about your computer or mobile device, such as the type of hardware and software you are using.

As with most websites and technology services delivered over the internet, we may automatically collect data when you access or use our Site and/or Services and record it in log files.
This log data may include the IP address, browser type, the date and time of use, information about browser configuration, language preferences, cookie data, and information about your computer or mobile device, such as the type of hardware and software you are using.
We store log data in AWS that is necessary for us to ensure the reliability and uptime of our Services.
Virtual Sapiens stores minimal calendar and meeting data that is necessary to provide a seamless integration with our Services.

However, non-personally identifiable information may be provided to other parties for industry or communication research, analysis, demographic profiling, publications, norm development or other uses.
We may disclose anonymized, non-personally identifiable information publicly and to third parties - for example, as part of progress reports or comparisons for other users in connection virtual presence metrics and progress trend analytics.

We only disclose Personal Data to third parties when:

These service providers may only access, process, or store Personal Data pursuant to our instructions and to perform their duties to us.
We also use service providers for specific services and functions, including email communication, customer support services, and analytics.

We generally use, process, and store Personal Data on the basis of consent.
We may also process Personal Data on other bases permitted by the GDPR and applicable laws, such as when the processing is necessary for (i) compliance with our legal obligations, (ii) performance of a contract with the data subject, or (iii) protecting vital interests.
